column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Five years ago I went to New York City .
#text=I live in Missouri , so New York City is very far away from me .
#text=I decided to buy plain tickets so I could ride in an airplane to get there .
#text=I had never ridden on an airplane before , so I was a little bit nervous .
#text=My sister drove me to the airport .
#text=Once I got there , I went up to the counter to check my luggage .
#text=The lady working at the counter was very nice and told me where to go .
#text=I went through a metal detector that security guards were monitoring .
#text=I found my airplane terminal , and I patiently waited while sitting in a chair .
#text=Over the speakers , a voice told passengers we could begin boarding the plane .
#text=I got onto the plane and the ride took about three hours .
